name: easy-svn
description: Make svn easy to be used in nodejs.

scripts.release: npm config set registry=http://registry.npmjs.org && npm version patch && npm publish
scripts.setproxy: git config --global http.https://github.com.proxy socks5://127.0.0.1:1080 && git config --global https.https://github.com.proxy socks5://127.0.0.1:1080

author: Halliwood
